channel.title: {[ ReaperZScape. ]} *UPDATED*
channel.description:
[center]{ReaperZScape}[/center] [I Will Be Posting More] Hello my name is Omar and I have been very fascinated my the evolution of RSPS. I am here today to tell you about a project that I have been working on, First, this server needs a work and with enough help, this server could be incredible. There are many servers out there today, such as Deltascape, Project Insanity, Battlescape and you guys know the rest. Anyways I have been coding Delta for a very long time, and I do have a Delta Base that has been modified a lot. The Combat is good, exp is good, and there is also a whole new organization of files to it. However, I also do have a Project Insanity base I have been working on. I haven't put much work on it compared to the work I put on my Delta Base. If you would rather work on Delta, or Project Insanity tell me, I would work with any of them. What Positions We need:
We need two source coders, one of which is taken by me. We need a client coder. We need a media Designer. we need a forums maker.
Positions Taken:
Source Coder: Taken By Me. Hoster: Taken By My Mate.
Positions Available:
Source Coder Client Coder Forums Maker Media Designer
Pictures & Information of my Delta SOurce: Venge Works 100% Minigames such as: Barrows, Fight Pits, Pest Control, Assuslt All Work 100% (I Yet to find a glitch on any of them :P) Many Npc Dioluge I Have a few custom quests with awesome rewards Hit Timers are what I find very close to perfect Claws Spec 100% All Gs Specs Work Full Vesta, Statius, Morgans, Zuriels Full Dragon INcluding PLate My Failed Login Screen XD [img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/8899/0005x.png[/img] Item On Death Screen [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/4749/itemondeath.png[/img] This Is custom shop interface [img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/1543/newshop.png[/img] Gs Making :) [img]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/4908/workinggsmaking.png[/img] Some NPc Dioluge and teleports [img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/2697/npcdiolagueandteleports.png[/img] All The Skillcapes including donator [img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/8238/allskillcapes.png[/img] Sexy Pk Gear :) [img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/5332/0003h.png[/img] Full Bandos [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/866/bandosset.png[/img] Full Statius [img]http://img806.imageshack.us/img806/1931/fullstatius.png[/img] Full Vesta [img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/9748/fullvesta.png[/img] Full Zuriels [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/6821/fullzuriels.png[/img] Full Morgans [img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/6435/fullmorgans.png[/img] ReaperZscape FTW? [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/9043/reaperzscapeftw.png[/img] To Apply please enter all the information in the comment section.
